attributes.action: Full strict lockdown with boarders (Isle Of Man / New Zeland style Lockdown)
attributes.additional_details:
We want to gouverment to inplement all the messures that these countries used so we can get back to normality as fast as we can.
most people have allready said they would rather have one long super stricks lockdown with the boarders closed rather than the perpetual nonaffective lockdowns and teir levels. and also keep these boarders closed permanatly to countries that have not also done this same stratagy.we also want much less people working, as many people currently working are not "essential"
attributes.background:
Being allmost a year into the Coronavirus Pandemic now and lockdown after lockdown destroying both the economy and our mental health, The public Is now wanting this to end once and for all. 
However we are now far enough into this pandemic to see what works well in other island nations.
